title: Price
description: This schema is used to set prices for merchant SKUs.  An overall price must be set for the product.  You can also refine a price further by setting the price at the fulfillment node level.

price.description: The overall price that the merchant SKU is priced at

thor_current_price.description: THIS IS A FIELD ONLY USED BY JET.COM. ANY VALUE UPLOADED WILL BE IGNORED

fulfillment_node_id.description: The fulfillment node assigned in the Jet Merchant Portal for a merchant fulfillment node

fulfillment_node_price.description: The price of the merchant SKU at the fulfillment node level
